name: Jazz Defense
description:
Jazz up your night with a musical challenge! In Jazz Defense, you have to put on a smooth show while fending off the noisy construction tools that want to ruin your groove. The game is a Tower Defense where you place jazz instruments on the stage to create a cool soundtrack and keep the audience happy. Don’t let the tools steal your show!
